jediahkatz.gameserver

Class GameClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • jediahkatz.gameserver.GameClient

  • public class GameClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A client that can connect to a server and send messages.
    Author:
    jediahkatz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameClient.AlreadyInRoomException
      Exception thrown when trying to join a room while already in a room.
      class  GameClient.NoSuchRoomException
      Exception thrown when trying to access a room that doesn't exist.
      class  GameClient.RoomFullException
      Exception thrown when trying to join a full room.

        Parameters:
        parent - the current sketch (this)
        host - the hostname of the server
        port - the port to transfer data over

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disconnect if we haven't already.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Let the server know that we're disconnecting, and disconnect.

      • connected

        public boolean connected()
        Check if this client is currently connected to the server.
        Returns:
        true if this client is connected, otherwise false

      • id

        public int id()
        Get the unique identifier for this client.
        Returns:
        the client id

      • roomId

        public java.lang.Integer roomId()
        Get the id of the room that this client is currently in, or null if this client is not in a room.
        Returns:
        the id of this client's room, or null if not in a room

      • createRoom

        public int createRoom(int capacity)
        Create a new room.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the maximum number of clients allowed in the room
        Returns:
        the unique id of the newly created room

      • joinRoom

        public RoomInfo joinRoom(int roomId)
        Join an existing room.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the unique id of the room to join
        Returns:
        an object containing info about the room joined
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no room exists with the given id
        GameClient.RoomFullException - if the room is already full
        GameClient.AlreadyInRoomException - if this client is currently in a room

      • leaveRoom

        public void leaveRoom()
        Leave the room that this client is currently in. If the client is not in a room this method does nothing.

      • autojoinRoom

        public RoomInfo autojoinRoom(int capacity)
        Join any room that isn't full, or create a new room if all rooms are full.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the maximum number of clients allowed in a new room, if one is created
        Returns:
        an object containing info about the room joined
        Throws:
        GameClient.AlreadyInRoomException - if this client is currently in a room

      • getRoomInfo

        public RoomInfo getRoomInfo(int roomId)
        Get info about a room.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the unique id of the room to look up
        Returns:
        an object containing info about the room
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no room exists with the given id

      • getRoomsInfo

        public RoomInfo[] getRoomsInfo()
        Get info about all rooms on the server.
        Returns:
        an array of objects containing info about the rooms

      • setRoomAttributes

        public void setRoomAttributes(int roomId,
                              processing.data.JSONObject attributes)
        Set the attributes for a room with a new JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the unique id of the room to set attributes for
        attributes - the object containing the attributes to set for the room
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no room exists with the given id

        Set the attributes for the server with a new JSONObject.

        public void getServerAttributes()
        Get the attributes for the server as a JSONObject.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(int recipientId,
                        processing.data.JSONObject message)
        Send a message to a single client.
        Parameters:
        recipientId - the unique id of the message recipient
        message - the body of the message

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(int[] recipientIds,
                        processing.data.JSONObject message)
        Send a message to multiple clients.
        Parameters:
        recipientIds - an array of the unique ids of all message recipients
        message - the body of the message

      • broadcastMessage

        public void broadcastMessage(processing.data.JSONObject message)
        Send a message to all clients in the same room as this client, including this client. If this client is not in a room, this method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        message - the body of the message

      • getNextMessage

        public Message getNextMessage()
        Get the next message received by this client from the queue. If there are no messages, this method returns null.
        Returns:
        the message text, or null if there are no messages

      • getMessages

        public Message[] getMessages()
        Get all messages received by this client.
        Returns:
        an array containing all messages, in increasing chronological order
